channel.title: Adrian's Homepage
channel.description: This is the RSS feed for my homepage. Since I update so infrequently, it is hard for people to keep up by checking manually.

item.title: Linear Programs and Polyhedra
item.description: I updated the text about linear programming. This updates finishes the first draft of the chapter about the shape of polyhedra. This enables me to talk about the basic simplex method in some later update. I also read the other chapters once more and corrected a couple of things.

item.title: Writing a Simple Parser in Rust (Update 2)
Writing a Simple Parser in Rust (Update)
item.description: It turns out that a pretty printer is too simple to warrant its own posting.

item.title: Writing a Simple Parser in Rust
item.description: In an effort to learn Rust I wrote a parser for simple arithmetic expressions. I want to parse expressions of the form `1234 + 43* (34 +[2])` using a simple recursive descent parser.

item.title: Grammar cards for Anki
item.description: Insert a link to http://dojgdeck.neocities.org/ in the Japanese page.

item.title: This site now has an RSS Feed
item.description: If you can read this you have successfully added the feed to your feed reader. Congratulations.
